rules.natural: Provided that the test takes place during the daytime at the start time, there is good visibility at the start time.
If there is good visibility at the start time, then the road is dry at the start time.
Provided that the road is dry at the start time, moderate traffic occurs at the start time.
Whenever there is moderate traffic at the start time, the testing phase is complete for the test vehicle.
Provided that manual override has been activated for the test vehicle, a system anomaly has been detected in the test vehicle.

Either manual override has been activated for the test vehicle, or if the safety protocol is enabled on the test vehicle, then under the condition that the testing phase is not complete for the test vehicle, emergency braking is not required for the test vehicle.
Under the condition that a warning signal has been issued for the test vehicle, human intervention has occurred with the test vehicle.
A road test is scheduled for the test vehicle, or a simulation test is scheduled for the test vehicle.
If the primary sensor is functional on the test vehicle, then whenever a system anomaly has been detected in the test vehicle, a warning signal is issued for the test vehicle.
Either the primary sensor is functional on the test vehicle, or the backup sensor is functional on the test vehicle.
Provided that the backup sensor is functional on the test vehicle, if a system anomaly has been detected in the test vehicle, then a warning signal is issued for the test vehicle.
If the test site environment is approved, then the testing phase is complete for the test vehicle.

The test vehicle has achieved the performance benchmark, or in the case that it is not the case that the test vehicle meets regulatory compliance or that if traffic is controlled at the test site then the perimeter is secured at the test site, certification is granted for the test vehicle.

Whenever a security patch has been applied to the test vehicle, if a software update has been installed on the test vehicle, and if the software validation has been completed for the test vehicle, then the test vehicle has not failed the safety check.
Under the condition that a simulation test is scheduled for the test vehicle, the testing phase is complete for the test vehicle.
Provided that the software update is approved by the manufacturer, a security patch has been applied to the test vehicle.
The software update is approved by the manufacturer, or the software update is certified by a third party.
Cloud connectivity is active for the test vehicle, or provided that the software update is certified by a third party, a security patch has been applied to the test vehicle.
If remote monitoring is enabled for the test vehicle, then whenever cloud connectivity is active for the test vehicle, real-time data is being uploaded from the test vehicle.
Provided that the main facility control center is operational, remote monitoring is enabled for the test vehicle.
Either the main facility control center is operational, or the backup facility control center is operational.
If the backup facility control center is operational, then remote monitoring is enabled for the test vehicle.
Whenever a mechanical inspection has been completed on the test vehicle, the test vehicle has passed the basic functionality assessment.
A mechanical inspection has been completed on the test vehicle, or the software validation has been completed for the test vehicle.
The sensor calibration for the test vehicle is complete, or under the condition that the software validation has been completed for the test vehicle, the test vehicle has not failed the safety check.
The navigation system is active in the test vehicle, or it is not the case that the sensor calibration for the test vehicle is complete.
If it is not the case that if a road test is scheduled for the test vehicle then the test vehicle is operational, then the test vehicle has failed the safety check.

Provided that it is not the case that the test vehicle meets regulatory compliance or that if traffic is controlled at the test site then the perimeter is secured at the test site, it is not the case that certification has been granted for the test vehicle.
Under the condition that the test site environment is not approved, traffic is controlled at the test site.
Whenever the test site environment is not approved, it is not the case that the perimeter is secured at the test site.
If the testing phase is not complete for the test vehicle, then emergency braking is required for the test vehicle.
